item.title: Diagram tester
item.description:
It looks like using Mermaid diagrams will result in a gigantic CSS file (6367580 bytes, or around 6.3 MB).

  flowchart LR
    A["Apache port 443"]
    B["Anubis port 8082"]
    style B fill:#ffffde
    C["Apache port 8083"]
    D["Denial page"]
    A-->B
    B-->|Pass|C
    B-->|Fail|D
